componentInstanceProperties.name: condition
componentInstanceProperties.value: SIREC__SIREC_fld_proceso__c =: recordId AND RecordType.DeveloperName = 'SIREC_rt_procesosContratos' AND SIR_estadoCarga__c != 'B'
